column5: I am curious about the trolling speed you prefer for walleye. I recognize that different conditions may call for variance, but would be interested in general or detailed opinions on this topic. Thanks!
For trolling spoons, 2.2 on the GPS has been a good speed for me.
We'll push 4 mph and more trolling cranks.

Every crankbait that we troll determines our trolling speed. I always try to go a speed that will give me maximum action on the crankbait and if we are trolling shallow (10/15ft) I want to keep the bait in contact with the bottom as much as I can. This gives an erratic action and makes it run where the fish live. I like Shad Raps deep divers in Greens,Blue, Orange and chrome. Any combination of these colors work well also.
